titles.title: Valley View Ferry Preservation Act of 2013
To exempt the vessel John Craig from certain requirements when operating on a portion of the Kentucky River, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 6/27/2013--Introduced. Exempts the vessel John Craig from certain requirements when operating on a portion of the Kentucky River.
